Actions.Name: Slime Stream
Actions.Effects: Foes in the area must save or become pacified and poisoned. Pacified foes take bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Polaris
Actions.Description: Mark a visible space. At the end of each turn past this one (foe or allied), roll a d6. On a 6, a meteor smashes into the space, inflicting [D]+[fray] in a blast 1 area effect on that space. This effect ends at the start of the snail's next turn, or when triggered.

Actions.Name: Bubble Shield
Actions.Description: The Snail gains Aura 2 until the start of its next turn. Characters in the aura gain resistance to abilities from outside the aura.

Actions.Name: Pearlescent Bubble
Actions.Description: The Snail spits out three bubbles in range 4.

Summons.Name: Pearlescent Bubble
Summons.SummonEffects: When a character collides with the bubble, it pops, pacifying them, shoving them 3 in any direction, and creating a space of difficult terrain. Pacified characters are stunned.
